item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在共和党初选和党团会议中似乎几乎所向披靡，但尽管他取得了令人瞩目的胜利，这位领跑者在大选选民中的实力仍不明朗。美联社记者乔希-博克（Josh Boak）将为您详细解读。
item.description:
Donald Trump appears close to invincible in the Republican primaries and caucuses, but despite his commanding victories, the front-runner’s strength among general election voters remains unclear.

AP’s Josh Boak explains more. pic.twitter.com/dW0bFWyOpA

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 虽然乔-拜登（Joe Biden）和唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在迄今为止的每场竞选中都以较大优势获胜，并且是再次赢得各自党派提名的压倒性热门人选，但他们还不是 "推定提名人"。美联社记者梅格-金纳德（Meg Kinnard）将为您详细解读。
item.description:
While Joe Biden and Donald Trump have won every contest so far by large margins and are the overwhelming favorites to once again win their parties’ nominations, they’re not the “presumptive nominees” just yet. AP’s Meg Kinnard explains more. pic.twitter.com/xaaHQYp2Do

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 4, 2024
